title: The God of the Philosophers? or the God who Participates in and Transforms our Suffering?
description:
Roger Marshall has written a compelling summary of ideas surrounding the God of the philosophers, and the need we have to understand the personal nature of God.

Roger's conversation with Paul VanderKlay:  https://youtu.be/2Lm_ZWrr6P8

Links to the 3 part essay:
https://evangelicalfocus.com/features/14285/philosophers-and-god-1
https://evangelicalfocus.com/features/14412/philosophers-and-god-2
https://evangelicalfocus.com/features/14633/philosophers-and-god-and-3

I (Karen) get a little more personal than usual in this conversation as Roger asks about experiences related to serving immigrants or friendship evangelism and the shape of the transformed life.
